docs.snippet: A consumer rights official has vowed to question the organisers of a masters football match after Argentina brought a lookalike rather than the advertised Claudio Caniggia to take part in a veterans game, Brazilian media reported on Monday....

headline.main: Argentina Field Caniggia Lookalike in Brazil Masters Game
headline.print_headline: Argentina Field Caniggia Lookalike in Brazil Masters Game

docs.lead_paragraph: A consumer rights official has vowed to question the organisers of a masters football match after Argentina brought a lookalike rather than the advertised Claudio Caniggia to take part in a veterans game, Brazilian media reported on Monday.

docs.snippet: New York's top court said prosecutors seeking to convict the killer of a transgender woman can press for a new trial after losing on Monday their appeal to reinstate his conviction and 25-year sentence for what they said was a hate crime....

headline.main: N.Y. State Court Rejects Hate Crime Conviction in Transgender Murder
headline.print_headline: N.Y. State Court Rejects Hate Crime Conviction in Transgender Murder

docs.lead_paragraph: New York's top court said prosecutors seeking to convict the killer of a transgender woman can press for a new trial after losing on Monday their appeal to reinstate his conviction and 25-year sentence for what they said was a hate crime.
